◆ Open() [1/6]

static Status arrow::io::FileOutputStream::Open ( const std::string &  path,
std::shared_ptr< OutputStream > *  out 
)
static

Open a local file for writing, truncating any existing file.

Parameters
[in]pathwith UTF8 encoding
[out]outa base interface OutputStream instance

When opening a new file, any existing file with the indicated path is truncated to 0 bytes, deleting any existing data

◆ Open() [3/6]

static Status arrow::io::FileOutputStream::Open ( int  fd,
std::shared_ptr< OutputStream > *  out 
)
static

Open a file descriptor for writing.

The underlying file isn't truncated.

Parameters
[in]fdfile descriptor
[out]outa base interface OutputStream instance

The file descriptor becomes owned by the OutputStream, and will be closed on Close() or destruction.
